## `SAS` {.unnumbered .unlisted}
``` sas
options symbolgen mprint mlogic;
%macro Debogage;
  %local phrase i j;
  %let phrase = Voici une phrase;
  %do i = 1 %to %sysfunc(countw(&phrase.));
    %let j = %scan(&phrase., &i.);
	%put Mot n°&i. = &j.;
  %end;
%mend Debogage;
%Debogage;
options nosymbolgen nomprint nomlogic;
```
